pkgmetadata.longdescription: PRO-CTCAE Scoring, Analysis, and Graphical Tools // A collection of tools to facilitate standardized analysis and graphical procedures when using the National Cancer Institutes Patient- Reported Outcomes version of the Common Terminology Criteria for Adverse Events (PRO-CTCAE). NOTE: Some tools here require additional packages be installed which are not available on CRAN at the time of this version update ('ProAE' v0.2.8). These packages and their respective repositories are listed here: 'ggpattern' https://github.com/coolbutuseless/ggpattern.
